quote: Lisa, love is magical,” Rema said. “Scientists give such simplified explanations for it, and they’re wrong, because love isn’t something that happens in your brain. Love happens in your soul.
quote_letters: LISA LOVE IS MAGICAL REMA SAID SCIENTISTS GIVE SUCH SIMPLIFIED EXPLANATIONS FOR IT AND THEYRE WRONG BECAUSE LOVE ISNT SOMETHING THAT HAPPENS IN YOUR BRAIN LOVE HAPPENS IN YOUR SOUL
